short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Kick UI extension gives the Kick Streaming Platform a Twitch-inspired makeover, transforming key elements for a seamless interfa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Kick Streaming Platform UI extension is a convenient feature that transforms the interface of the Kick Streaming Platform website to resemble Twitch. Foundational elements such as the chat window, video playback screen, and channel pages are designed with a Twitch-inspired style.
